name: Brick-Eyes Brick Wall
text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish 1 "Brick-Eyes" monster face-up on your field or in your hand, and if you do, banish it. You can only activate "Brick-Eyes Brick Wall" if you control a "Brick-Eyes" Extra Deck monster. You can only activate 1 "Brick-Eyes Brick Wall" per turn.
